name: template-multi-page-vue-ssr
description: 一个基于 Webpack + Vue 的多页面服务端渲染项目模板

scripts.dev:page: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=dev npx webpack-dev-server --config build/webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.build:page:dev: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=dev npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:page:test: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=test npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:page:prod: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=prod npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
